author: Simon Difford
description: A Godfather made with bourbon is "The Boss" so it stands to reason that with bottled-in-bond rye, it is the Big Boss.
name: Big Boss
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
